lines: No evil shall enter the land of Lindon.
Our King Gil-Galad died in battle with the Dark Lord himself.
There are some who say our lord Círdan is the oldest elf in all of Middle-Earth.
Our lord Círdan had no parentage, for he is eldest of all the elves, and was amongst the first elves to awaken by the seas of The East.
What tidings do you bring to the land of Lindon?
Welcome to the last fair realm in all Middle-earth, #p.
Welcome to the land of Círdan the Shipwright!
These lands were once ruled by Gil-galad, High King of the Noldor. But he was lost, long ago, in the siege of the Dark Tower.
This land has been fair since the Elder Days.
In the Elder Days this land was known as Ossiriand, where it was home to the first of our kin.
The haven of Mithlond is where the White Ships sail to Aman.
Only Elves know the path through the Straight Road.
Most of the Noldor live in the northern feif of Forlindon.
The southern feif of Harlindon is home to Silvan Elves, who were the origional residents of this land in the Elder Days.
Have you seen the Western Isles? They were once great hills before the destruction of Beleriand.
In this land, the last fair realm, the memory of Elder Days lingers still.
Ai! Mae govannen, arben na Lindon!
Mae govannen, arben nín
Welcome to Lindon, ranger.
Ai! Mae govannen Dúnadan! Welcome to Lindon!
The Dúnedain of the North have always been welcome to our fair realm.
The Eldar of Lindon have long been friends to the Dúnedain.
The elves of Lindon were allies to the Kingdom of Arnor centuries ago before its fall.
The high king of the Noldor, Gil-Galad fought alongside the Dúnedain in the Battle of The Last Alliance, and was slain by Sauron while fighting alongside Elendil.
For Lindon!
Na Lindon!
No evil may set foot in the Last Fair Realm!
You may not enter Lindon.
#p, you may not set foot in Lindon!
The Enemy has no hold over Lindon!
Your darkness shall not poison the Last Fair Realm east of the Sea!
Na Lindon!
The Enemy has no hold over Lindon!
We suffer no evil in Lindon!
You may not bring evil here, #p!
Your shadow shall not poison our fair realm!
Who brings to us this token of doom?
We shall not allow evil to enter our realm. Leave now or face our wrath!
You bring great evil here, #p. You can go no further.
Leave, #p, or face the might of our arrows!
No longer are you are welcome in our land!
I despair that we ever sheltered you in Lindon!
Bitterly now I regret welcoming you into Lindon!
